articles.title: Neuroscience Game-Changer: Entire Fruit Fly Brain Mapped in Stunning Detail for the First Time - SciTechDaily
articles.description: FlyWire Consortium built a complete connectome of every neuron in a Drosophila brain. A Princeton-led team of scientists has created the first detailed connectome of an adult fruit fly brain, a complex network with almost 140,000 neurons. This significant ste…
articles.content: For many heartbreaking diseases of the brain — dementia, Parkinson’s, Alzheimer’s, and others — doctors can only treat the symptoms. Medical science does not have a cure.Why? Because it’s confounding… [+8956 chars]
